Reviews.Title: not a good one
Reviews.Author: R. pandit
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera and found out very poor documentation , if they had youtube installation link probably it would help a lot warranty info is there but no address or web site to register so how you can return it or fix it , sd card can be only taken out if you screw out  the cover , my main reason to buy it was it can be used with my laptop only ,  but you need tv terminal to set it up so had to return it to amazon.

ProductInfo.Features:
1/3-inch CCD Color CCTV Infrared Motion DVR Surveillance Camera General Features:
Waterproof Surveillance Camera 1/3-inch CCD image sensor Thirty (30) Infrared LEDs
Motion detection recording up to 26-feet (8 meters)
Records via TransFlash (TF) card (microSD/microSDHC) up to 32 GB (card not included)
Advanced night vision technology
ProductInfo.Name: 1/3" CCD 480 Line Color CCTV IR Motion DVR (records itself via microSD/microSDHC slot) Waterproof Surveillance Camera
